author: Reuters Editorial
title: Hungary PM Orban declares election victory
text:
BUDAPEST (Reuters) - Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban declared victory after preliminary results from Sunday’s election showed voters handing him a third successive term in power and a two-thirds majority in parliament.
Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban addresses the supporters after the announcement of the partial results of parliamentary election in Budapest, Hungary, April 8, 2018. REUTERS/Leonhard Foeger “We have won,” Orban told a crowd of cheering supporters. “Hungary has won a great victory.”
He added: “High turnout has cast aside all doubts.”
Reporting by Gergely Szakacs and Krisztina Than; editing by Andrew Roche
